content: flower pop square created by @handmadebykama about the pattern flower pop is a very pretty granny square and it s quick and easy to make it could be used in blankets bags or shawls you will need per square about 5g of yarn for the example squares infinity hearts rose 100% cotton has been used in colour 33 pink 130 sea green 190 mustard and 66 light purple crochet hook size 2 5mm tapestry needle scissors note any yarn can be used with a suitable crochet hook the size of the square will depend on yarn and crochet hook used level advanced beginner size of the square after blocking 9 5 cm
